think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob 'fsync' and understand its default behavior in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine if 'fsync' has any special values that alter its functionality. 3. Research the implications of setting 'fsync' to -1 or 0. 4. Conclude if these special values disable the feature or change its operation significantly. 5. Based on the findings, classify 'fsync' as a special knob or not.
